inclusion.criterion: clinical and/or radiological diagnosis of acute non-perforated appendicitis
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: CT scan showed evidence of acute perforated appendicitis with free fluid in the pelvis, but diagnostic laparoscopy revealed phlegmon with no other abdominal abnormalities

inclusion.criterion: written informed child assent or waiver
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: CT scan showed evidence of acute perforated appendicitis with free fluid in the pelvis

exclusion.criterion: presentation with an appendix mass or phlegmon
exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: Diagnostic laparoscopy revealed phlegmon with no other abdominal abnormalities

exclusion.criterion: non-operative management initiated at an outside institution
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: previous episode of appendicitis or appendix mass/phlegmon treated non-operatively
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a candidate for emergent laparoscopic appendectomy under general anesthesia.
